1.label: It's Not Over Yet!
1.desc: On a desk in one of the hotel rooms.

4.label: Your Man Talked!
4.desc: On a desk on the upper floor.

5.label: Möller Is Moving!
5.desc: On a desk in the building.

2.label: Broken Resistance
2.desc: On a wooden crate in front of a ruined building.

3.label: Resistance Report
3.desc: On a desk inside the underground interrogation room.

4.label: Flagship Fuel Risks
4.desc: In Möller's safe on the upper floor. The safe code is acquired when collecting @link[letter.1], but it can also be opened with a satchel charge.

3.label: Pistol Workbench
3.desc: In the crypt beneath the church.

3.label: An "Original" Adolf
3.desc: In the church tower, on the floor beneath the sniper.

1.label: Neutralise Radio Communications
1.desc.2: Option B - Disable the radio equipment (0/3)

1.label: Interrogation Room
1.desc: An interrogation report is being kept in the basement tof a bookstore.

2.label: Resistance Café
2.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

3.label: Church Crypt
3.desc: Local Resistance have stored weapons in the church crypt.

4.label: Northern Ruins
4.desc: Resistance have a weapons cache opposite the town hall.

5.label: Axis Armory
5.desc: There is an armory in the lower levels of the U-boat pen.

6.label: Sea View Offices
6.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

7.label: Hotel
7.desc: Möller's safe code is somewhere in the hotel. Möller's safe is still in the hotel.

1.label: House Door
1.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.1] or a satchel charge.

2.label: Interrogation Room Door
2.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.2] or a satchel charge.

3.label: Building Door
3.desc.1: Can be opened with the @link[key.3] or a satchel charge, or from the inside.

4.label: Crypt Door
4.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.4] or a satchel charge.

5.label: Hotel Door
5.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.5] or a satchel charge.

3.label: Building Key
3.desc: On a key rack opposite of the door.

4.label: Crypt Key
4.desc: In a supply crate on the topmost floor of the church tower.

5.label: Hotel Key
5.desc: On a shelf in the hotel kitchen.
